00013         template <typename T>
00014         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat3x3<T, P> boxInertia3
00015         (
00016                 T const & Mass, 
00017                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & Scale
00018         )
00019         {
00020                 detail::tmat3x3<T, P> Result(T(1));
00021                 Result[0][0] = (Scale.y * Scale.y + Scale.z * Scale.z) * Mass / T(12);
00022                 Result[1][1] = (Scale.x * Scale.x + Scale.z * Scale.z) * Mass / T(12);
00023                 Result[2][2] = (Scale.x * Scale.x + Scale.y * Scale.y) * Mass / T(12);
00024                 return Result;
00025         }
00026 
00027         template <typename T>
00028         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> boxInertia4
00029         (
00030                 T const & Mass, 
00031                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & Scale
00032         )
00033         {
00034                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result(T(1));
00035                 Result[0][0] = (Scale.y * Scale.y + Scale.z * Scale.z) * Mass / T(12);
00036                 Result[1][1] = (Scale.x * Scale.x + Scale.z * Scale.z) * Mass / T(12);
00037                 Result[2][2] = (Scale.x * Scale.x + Scale.y * Scale.y) * Mass / T(12);
00038                 return Result;
00039         }
00040 
00041         template <typename T>
00042         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat3x3<T, P> diskInertia3
00043         (
00044                 T const & Mass, 
00045                 T const & Radius
00046         )
00047         {
00048                 T a = Mass * Radius * Radius / T(2);
00049                 detail::tmat3x3<T, P> Result(a);
00050                 Result[2][2] *= static_cast<T>(2);
00051                 return Result;
00052         }
00053 
00054         template <typename T>
00055         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> diskInertia4
00056         (
00057                 T const & Mass, 
00058                 T const & Radius
00059         )
00060         {
00061                 T a = Mass * Radius * Radius / T(2);
00062                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result(a);
00063                 Result[2][2] *= static_cast<T>(2);
00064                 Result[3][3] = static_cast<T>(1);
00065                 return Result;
00066         }
00067 
00068         template <typename T>
00069         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat3x3<T, P> ballInertia3
00070         (
00071                 T const & Mass, 
00072                 T const & Radius
00073         )
00074         {
00075                 T a = static_cast<T>(2) * Mass * Radius * Radius / T(5);
00076                 return detail::tmat3x3<T, P>(a);
00077         }
00078

00082                 T const & Mass, 
00083                 T const & Radius
00084         )
00085         {
00086                 T a = static_cast<T>(2) * Mass * Radius * Radius / T(5);
00087                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result(a);
00088                 Result[3][3] = static_cast<T>(1);
00089                 return Result;
00090         }
00091

00093         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat3x3<T, P> sphereInertia3

00095                 T const & Mass, 
00096                 T const & Radius
00097         )
00098         {
00099                 T a = static_cast<T>(2) * Mass * Radius * Radius / T(3);
00100                 return detail::tmat3x3<T, P>(a);
